feedback_min_jokes_viewed.description: Min jokes viewed before showing app bar feedback icon

review_min_days_used.description: Min number of distinct days used before eligible for review request

review_min_viewed_jokes.description: Min number of jokes viewed before eligible for review request

review_min_saved_jokes.description: Min number of jokes saved before eligible for review request

review_min_shared_jokes.description: Min number of jokes shared before eligible for review request

review_request_from_joke_viewed.description: If true, allow review request from joke viewed event

review_require_daily_subscription.description: If true, require daily subscription to be enabled for review request

review_prompt_variant.description: Which review prompt variant to show: bunny|kitten

default_joke_viewer_reveal.description: Default reveal mode for joke viewer when no local pref exists

share_images_mode.description: Mode for how to share images: auto|separate|stacked
